content: अपकर्षण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Taking or drawing away, removing, diminishing (<ab>opp.</ab> वर्धक); न चास्ति सदृशं तेन किंचित्स्थौल्यापकर्षणं <ls>Suśr.</ls> --णं {@--1@} Removing, taking away; drawing away or down, depriving (one) of, drawing out, extracting. {@--2@} Lessening, making inferior, detraction. {@--3@} Superseding. {@--4@} Denying; abolishing.
